name: Wormhole (KomradeKev)
description:
In "Wormhole"  You must build a rocket with a budget, then fly it based on the rocket you built.  Manage money, and then fly!   

Made in the span of 1 week for the Brackey's Game Jam.

Game Designed and built by Kevin J (boyle.kj@gmail.com - please do not contact with sales offers)

UI Design by:
Quweert
